short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SPT is a Google Chrome extension for text sequence suggestions. Suggested text can be chosen by TAB, or mouse click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is a trained recurrent neural network used in Chrome extension for English text sequence suggestions during the writing of text by the user. The intention is to simplify the writing of frequent phrases. This tool contributes to enhancing the everyday user experience of writing on the Internet by using a neural network for English word sequence autocomplete in the browser.
